SAINT.Name: Meeting of the Vladimir Icon of the Mother of God (established in memory of the deliverance of Moscow from the Tatar invasion led by Crimean Khan Makhmet-Girei in 1521)
Holy Equal-to-the-Apostles Emperor Constantine the Great (+337) with his Mother Helen (+327)
Venerable Prince Yaroslav, (in baptism Constantine) (+1129), with his children Michael and Theodore, Wonderworkers of Murom (12th C)
Uncovering of the relics of Blessed Andrew of Simbirsk (1998)
Venerable Cassian the Greek of Uglich (+1504)
Synaxis of All Saints of Karelia
Revered lists of the Vladimir Icon of the Mother of God: the Pskov-Pechersk 'Tenderness' (1524), Zaonikievskaya (1588), Krasnogorskaya or Montenegro (1603), Orange (1634)
